title: Score breakdown visualization per case
description: Create a visual component that shows the score breakdown for a single case result. Should clearly display each scorer's score with color coding and the reasoning behind each score.
acceptance_criteria: Visual breakdown showing each scorer type
Horizontal bar or radial indicator for each score
Reason text displayed below each score
Pass/fail indicator per scorer based on min_score
Expanded mode for full detail view
implementation_notes: ScoreBar component: simple div with percentage width and color
Could use Recharts BarChart for consistency
Reason text may be multi-line - handle gracefully
Evidence is array of strings - use bullet list or collapsible
